EmailTemplate.name: Passives NonDetractor Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Passives NonDetractor Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.Account_Manager__c},
Your contact {!Contact.Name} has responded to your survery. He/She is a “PASSIVE” with a score of {!Contact.NPS_Score__c}.
For details please follow the link: {!Contact.Link}
Best regards, System Administrator
